name: Câu Chuyện Cảnh Sát Đông Bắc 2(2023)
genre: ['Phim Hành Động', 'Phim Hình Sự', 'Phim Chính Kịch']
overview: Li Hongqi, a righteous Northeast police officer, accidentally discovers the existence of local bullies involved in pornography. As the investigation deepens, a gang of local tyrants who control and oppress women with drugs emerges and openly provokes the police. Li Hongqi has decided to fight to the end, and is bound to eradicate this "pornography tumor".
